Html:
Hi,

  Thank you for creating such excellent graphing package.  However, in the Silverlight version, it has a major issue, that prevents me from using it.

  The issue is that, when panning, or zooming, or resizing the chart, the curves and the axis are not updated on the same scale!  So after panning or zooming, or resizing, the chart becomes incorrect!

  You can even observe this behavior in the Silverlight sample page:

http://dynamicdatadisplay.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=DynamicDataDisplay%20Silverlight

  For example, if  you pan the Allergology sample vertically, you can see the green curve will be changing from above 600 to below 600.  It is a major issue for me.  It appears that WPF version is okay.  Is there a fix for this issue?  Do other people have the same problem?

--Peter
